<column gap="tiny">

<title level="2" right="Creature 21">[The Wriggling Man](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2369)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 466</row>

**Perception** +35; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +39, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +41, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +39, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +37, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +41, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +39

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +9

**Con** +5

**Int** +10

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +8
</row>

**Items**
_[bag of holding type IV](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249)_ (containing small library of spellbooks containing all of his prepared spells), _+2 [greater fire resistant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=283) [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, [major staff of transmutation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=363)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 47 [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1)

**Fort** +34 

**Ref** +39 

**Will** +35 

+4 status vs. mental
</row>

**HP** 325
([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 20)

**Immunities**
disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, swarm mind, unconscious

**Resistances**
fire 10, physical 20

**Weaknesses**
area damage 20, splash damage 20

**Discorporate** When the worm that walks is reduced to 0 HP, it discorporates and the component worms that make up its body disperse in every direction. If even a single worm escapes, the worm that walks will eventually re-form using a process that typically takes 1d10 days.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tendril +36 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d12+13 [persistent piercing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 44, attack +36
- **Cantrips (10th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193)
- **6th**
[Baleful Polymorph](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)
- **7th**
[Reverse Gravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=261), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Veil](/Spells.aspx?ID=355)
- **8th**
[Contingency](/Spells.aspx?ID=49) (already cast), [Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161) (already cast), [Mind Blank](/Spells.aspx?ID=192) (already cast)
- **9th**
[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Project Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=237)
- **10th**
[Time Stop](/Spells.aspx?ID=339)

**Contingency** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** The Wriggling Man is reduced to 50 or fewer HP; **Effect** [_Dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), heightened to 5th level, teleports the Wriggling Man to area M6.

**Effortless Concentration** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Trigger** The wriggling man's turn begins. **Effect** The Wriggling Man immediately gains the effects of the Sustain a Spell action, allowing him to extend the duration of an active spell.

**Quickened Casting** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** When the Wriggling Man casts a spell of 8th level or lower, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

**Squirming Embrace** <actions string="Single Action" />  The worm that walks Strides, ending its movement sharing a space with a creature, and deals 8d8 piercing damage to the creature. The creature can attempt a basic Reflex save with a DC of 44.

**Swarm Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The worm that walks collapses into a shapeless swarm of worms. It drops all held, worn, and carried items. While discorporated, the worm that walks can't use attack actions and can't cast spells, but it can move through areas small enough for its individual worms to fit without having to Squeeze. It can use the same action to coalesce back into its normal form.

</column>
